attributes.action: Recognise EMA / WHO authorised vaccines for UK Entry & quarantine requirements.
attributes.additional_details: This is so that there is no need to quarantine on arrival in the UK. For example, the Serum Institute of India has created millions of vaccines under the name "Covisheild" however this is the Oxford/AstraZeneca (Vaxzevria) made under license. It is the exact same jab, but not recognised in the UK, even though it was created and administered in the UK, AND the UK imported millions and used them when domestic/European supply was not able to keep up with the demand.
attributes.background: In line with all European countries, recognise all WHO approved COVID vaccines administered outside of the Europe & USA.
